SampleID.help_tip: Required. Unique sample tracking ID for your project. This should be a name used to identify where you sampled, in addition to a unique number separated by an underscore. For example, a project sampling across Ghana could have the sample IDs “GH_1”, “GH_2”, and a project sampling in wetlands and mountains in Scotland could have the IDs “S_wetland_1”, “S_wetland_2”, “S_mountain_3”. Prepending the number with 0 is accepted, so “S_wetland_01”, “S_wetland_02”, “S_mountain_03” are also acceptable. No dashes allowed. Only letters, numbers and the underscore _ character.

Site_name.help_tip: Optional, the region or local name of site collected. Can be the same name for multiple samples.

Latitude.help_tip: Required. Latitude of coordinates measured using WGS1984 (default on most GPS). Ideally in decimal format. Numeric only (no degree symbols) with a dot (.) seperator. Example 3.68823

Longitude.help_tip: Required. Longitude of coordinates measured using WGS1984 (default on most GPS). Ideally in decimal format. Numeric only (no degree symbols) with a dot (.) seperator. Example 39.68602

Elevation.help_tip: Required. Elevation in meters above sea level

Vegetation.help_tip: List of names of local vegetation, if names unknown describe (trees, grass, forbs, etc). Max 200 characters

Land_use.help_tip: Required. Land use category of the site.

ResolveEcoregion.help_tip: Automatically added by application. Ecoregion based on the RESOLVE/ECOREGIONS/2017 dataset

BaileysEcoregion.help_tip: Automatically added by application. Ecoregion based on the Bailey's Ecoregions of the World (1989)

Agricultural_land.help_tip: Required. Was the land where the sample taken agricultural?

Grid_Size.help_tip: Required. Size of your sampling grid. 30m is the standard

Soil_depth.help_tip: Required. Depth of soil core. 5-10cm is the SPUN standard

Drying.help_tip: Required. If airdried, select time drying. Airdrying includes drying with silica gel. Select ‘No’ if no airdrying carried out

Date_collected.help_tip: Required. Date the sample was collected. Must be YYYY-MM-DD format

DNA_concentration_ng_ul.help_tip: Required. Concentration of DNA (ng/ul). If too low or NA, you can put 0. Numeric only.

Sample_or_Control.help_tip: Required. Indicate ‘True sample' if the sample is a collected sample, 'Control' if sample is a negative control

Notes.help_tip: Any additional notes about the sample.
